channel.title: Asterisk on Mauri870's dev blog
channel.description: Recent content in Asterisk on Mauri870's dev blog

item.title: Writing an Asterisk PBX module in Rust and C
item.description: Asterisk modules are commonly written in C, but what about writing an Asterisk module in Rust? Let’s find out.

item.title: Asterisk leaking resources? No, it's gsutil :'(
item.description: This week we solved a resource leak in our asterisk images reserved for call handling. Here’s the path we follow to mitigate the issue, which we find out to be related with the gsutil command line tool.
